column4: hi another problem how to get the function apt-get to exit? Becouse i cannot use Ununtu software center?
ok i have installed wine througt terminal and now i want to install another program througt UBuntu  software center.And it refuses becouse apt-get is still running?
how is that possible or how can i fix this?
then close terminal runing apt, you can't use both at the same time
